text: Tilney gently hinted her fear of being late ; and in half a minute they ran downstairs together , in an alarm not wholly unfounded , for General Tilney was pacing the drawing - room , his watch in his hand , and having , on the very instant of their entering , pulled the bell with violence , ordered “ Dinner to be on table _ directly ! _ ” Catherine trembled at the emphasis with which he spoke , and sat pale and breathless , in a most humble mood , concerned for his children , and detesting old chests ; and the General , recovering his politeness as he looked at her , spent the rest of his time in scolding his daughter for so foolishly hurrying her fair friend , who was absolutely out of breath from haste , when there was not the least occasion for hurry in the world : but Catherine could not at all get over the double distress of having involved her friend in a lecture and been a great simpleton herself , till they were happily seated at the dinner - table , when the General ’s complacent smiles , and a good appetite of her own , restored her to peace .

text: The dining - parlour was a noble room , suitable in its dimensions to a much larger drawing - room than the one in common use , and fitted up in a style of luxury and expense which was almost lost on the unpractised eye of Catherine , who saw little more than its spaciousness and the number of their attendants .

text_tokenized: And how singularly strange that it should fall to her lot to discover it !

text: till she had made herself mistress of its contents , however , she could have neither repose nor comfort ; and with the sun ’s first rays she was determined to peruse it .
text_tokenized: till she had made herself mistress of its contents , however , she could have neither repose nor comfort ; and with the sun ’s first rays she was determined to peruse it .

text: But many were the tedious hours which must yet intervene .
text_tokenized: But many were the tedious hours which must yet intervene .

text: She shuddered , tossed about in her bed , and envied every quiet sleeper .
text_tokenized: She shuddered , tossed about in her bed , and envied every quiet sleeper .

text: The storm still raged , and various were the noises , more terrific even than the wind , which struck at intervals on her startled ear .
text_tokenized: The storm still raged , and various were the noises , more terrific even than the wind , which struck at intervals on her startled ear .

text: The very curtains of her bed seemed at one moment in motion , and at another the lock of her door was agitated , as if by the attempt of somebody to enter .
text_tokenized: The very curtains of her bed seemed at one moment in motion , and at another the lock of her door was agitated , as if by the attempt of somebody to enter .

text: Hollow murmurs seemed to creep along the gallery , and more than once her blood was chilled by the sound of distant moans .
text_tokenized: Hollow murmurs seemed to creep along the gallery , and more than once her blood was chilled by the sound of distant moans .

text: Hour after hour passed away , and the wearied Catherine had heard three proclaimed by all the clocks in the house before the tempest subsided or she unknowingly fell fast asleep .
text_tokenized: Hour after hour passed away , and the wearied Catherine had heard three proclaimed by all the clocks in the house before the tempest subsided or she unknowingly fell fast asleep .
